name: Robotree
description:
Hello travelers! 
Today my game will take you to a another planet. The the inhabitants are the robots! 

The Robotree is a adventure, FPS game, where you are the space traveller and stuck to another planet. You must resolve local conflict with robots and the tree. Can you do this?

Control:
WSAD - move
Mouse - rotation and direction
Left Mouse - fire 
Spacebar - jump

Have fun!
